body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Virginia native. Married to Evaline Britton Hargis. Father of Sarah Hargis, Alexander Hargis, Thomas Hargis, William Hargis, James Hargis, and Nancy Hargis. Farmer and merchant in Breathitt County in 1860.
